demoCode.s:
<view>
    <view class="preview-caption">默认效果</view>
    <gov-image-item
        image-src="http://d.hiphotos.baidu.com/zhidao/pic/item/c8177f3e6709c93d8b21fbe49c3df8dcd00054d6.jpg">
    </gov-image-item>
    <view class="preview-caption">自定义样式</view>
    <gov-image-item
        class="gov-image-wrap gov-plate-img"
        image-src="http://d.hiphotos.baidu.com/zhidao/pic/item/c8177f3e6709c93d8b21fbe49c3df8dcd00054d6.jpg"
        image-width="400"
        image-height="400"
        border-radius="100">
    </gov-image-item>
</view>

externalClasses.name: gov-image-wrap
externalClasses.description: 整个图片容器的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变其的样式，如：设置水平处置居中

externalClasses.name: gov-opacity-border
externalClasses.description: 描边1px带透明度的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变其的样式，如border: 1px solid rgba(250, 0, 0, .1);

externalClasses.name: gov-plate-img
externalClasses.description: 图片的扩展样式类，可以通过此class改变其外层的样式，如设置透明度：opacity: .8
